member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Load.TxtLoadOptions.DetectNumberingWithWhitespaces
member.summary: Allows to specify how numbered list items are recognized when plain text document is converted. The default value is true.

remarks.para: If this option is set to false, lists recognition algorithm detects list paragraphs, when list numbers ends with either dot, right bracket or bullet symbols (such as "•", "*", "-" or "o").
If this option is set to true, whitespaces are also used as list number delimeters: list recognition algorithm for Arabic style numbering (1., 1.1.2.) uses both whitespaces and dot (".") symbols.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Load.TxtLoadOptions.TrailingSpacesOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets preferred option of a trailing space handling. Default value is .

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Load.TxtLoadOptions.LeadingSpacesOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets preferred option of a leading space handling. Default value is .

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Load.TxtLoadOptions.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding that will be used when loading Txt document. Can be null. Default is null.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Load.WordProcessingLoadOptions.DefaultFont
member.summary: Default font for Words document. The following font will be used if a font is missing.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Load.WordProcessingLoadOptions.AutoFontSubstitution
member.summary: If AutoFontSubstitution is disabled, GroupDocs.Conversion uses the DefaultFont for the substitution of missing fonts. If AutoFontSubstitution is enabled, GroupDocs.Conversion evaluates all the related fields in FontInfo (Panose, Sig etc) for the missing font and finds the closest match among the available font sources. Note that font substitution mechanism will override the DefaultFont in cases when FontInfo for the missing font is available in the document. The default value is True.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Load.WordProcessingLoadOptions.FontSubstitutes
member.summary: Substitute specific fonts when converting Words document.

member.summary: Set password to unprotect protected document

member.summary: Hide markup and track changes for Word documents

member.summary: XSL document stream to convert XML-FO using XSL

member.summary: The GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save namespace provides classes for customizing target document from conversion

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.PdfPageMode.FullScreen
member.summary: FullScreenFull-screen mode, with no menu bar, window controls, or any other window visible.

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.PdfPageLayout.OneColumn
member.summary: Display the pages in one column.

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.PdfPageLayout.TwoColumnLeft
member.summary: Display the pages in two columns, with odd-numbered pages on the left.

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.PdfPageLayout.TwoColumnRight
member.summary: Display the pages in two columns, with odd-numbered pages on the right.

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.PdfPageLayout.TwoPageLeft
member.summary: Display the pages two at a time, with odd-numbered pages on the left.

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.PdfPageLayout.TwoPageRight
member.summary: Display the pages two at a time, with odd-numbered pages on the right.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.CenterWindow
member.summary: Specify whether position of the document's window will be centered on the screen. Default: false.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.Direction
member.summary: Sets reading order of text: L2R (left to right) or R2L (right to left). Default: L2R.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.DisplayDocTitle
member.summary: Specifying whether document's window title bar should display document title. Default: false.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.FitWindow
member.summary: Specify whether document window must be resized to fit the first displayed page. Default: false.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.HideMenubar
member.summary: Specify whether menu bar should be hidden when document is active. Default: false.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.HideToolBar
member.summary: Specifying whether toolbar should be hidden when document is active. Default: false.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.HideWindowUI
member.summary: Specify whether user interface elements should be hidden when document is active. Default: false.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.NonFullScreenPageMode
member.summary: Sets page mode, specifying how to display the document on exiting full-screen mode.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.PageLayout
member.summary: Sets page layout which shall be used when the document is opened.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfFormattingOptions.PageMode
member.summary: Sets page mode, specifying how document should be displayed when opened.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfOptimizationOptions.CompressImages
member.summary: If CompressImages set to true, all images in the document are recompressed. The compression is defined by the ImageQuality property.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfOptimizationOptions.ImageQuality
member.summary: Value in percent where 100% is unchanged quality and image size. To decrease the image size, use ImageQuality less than 100

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfOptimizationOptions.UnembedFonts
member.summary: Make fonts not embedded if set to true

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfOptions.PdfFormat
member.summary: Set the pdf format of the converted document.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfOptions.Zoom
member.summary: Specifies the zoom level in percentage. Default is 100.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfOptions.Linearize
member.summary: Linearize PDF Document for the Web

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfOptions.Grayscale
member.summary: Convert a PDF from RGB colorspace to Grayscale

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfSaveOptions.ConvertFileType
member.summary: The desired file type to which the input document should be converted to

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfSaveOptions.Width
member.summary: Desired page width in pixels after conversion

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfSaveOptions.Height
member.summary: Desired page height in pixels after conversion

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfSaveOptions.Dpi
member.summary: Desired page DPI after conversion. The default resolution is: 96dpi

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfSaveOptions.Password
member.summary: Set this property if you want to protect the converted document with a password

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfSaveOptions.MarginTop
member.summary: Desired page top margin in pixels after conversion

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfSaveOptions.MarginBottom
member.summary: Desired page bottom margin in pixels after conversion

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfSaveOptions.MarginLeft
member.summary: Desired page left margin in pixels after conversion

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfSaveOptions.MarginRight
member.summary: Desired page right margin in pixels after conversion

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PdfSaveOptions.WordProcessingBookmarkOptions
member.summary: If the input document is WordProcessing the conversion will handle the wordprocessing bookmarks regarding this option.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.RtfOptions.ExportImagesForOldReaders
member.summary: Specifies whether the keywords for "old readers" are written to RTF or not. This can significantly affect the size of the RTF document. Default is False.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.SaveOptions.ConvertPages
member.summary: Convert specific pages. The list contains the page indexes of the pages to be converted

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.SaveOptions.UsePdf
member.summary: If true, the input firstly is converted to PDF and after that to desired format

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.SlidesSaveOptions.ConvertFileType
member.summary: The desired file type to which the input document should be converted to

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PresentationSaveOptions.ConvertFileType
member.summary: The desired file type to which the input document should be converted to

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PresentationSaveOptions.Password
member.summary: Set this property if you want to protect the converted document with a password

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.PresentationSaveOptions.Zoom
member.summary: Specifies the zoom level in percentage. Default is 100. Default zoom is supported till Microsoft Powerpoint 2010. Starting from Microsoft Powerpoint 2013 default zoom is no longer set to document, instead it appears to use the zoom factor of the last document that was opened.

member.name: T:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WatermarkOptions
member.summary: Options for settings watermark to the converted document

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WatermarkOptions.Font
member.summary: Watermark font name if text watermark is applied

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WatermarkOptions.Color
member.summary: Watermark font color if text watermark is applied

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WatermarkOptions.Transparency
member.summary: Watermark transparency. Value between 0 and 1. Value 0 is fully visible, value 1 is invisible.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WatermarkOptions.Background
member.summary: Indicates that the watermark is stamped as background. If the value is true, the watermark is layed at the bottom. By default is false and the watermark is layed on top.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WebpOptions.Lossless
member.summary: Indicates if the compression of the converted file will be lossless

member.name: T:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WordProcessingBookmarksOptions
member.summary: Options for handling Bookmarks in WordProcessing to PDF conversions

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WordProcessingBookmarksOptions.BookmarksOutlineLevel
member.summary: Specifies the default level in the document outline at which to display Word bookmarks. Default is 0. Valid range is 0 to 9.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WordProcessingBookmarksOptions.HeadingsOutlineLevels
member.summary: Specifies how many levels of headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) to include in the document outline. Default is 0. Valid range is 0 to 9.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WordProcessingBookmarksOptions.ExpandedOutlineLevels
member.summary: Specifies how many levels in the document outline to show expanded when the file is viewed. Default is 0. Valid range is 0 to 9. Note that this options will not work when saving to XPS.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WordsSaveOptions.ConvertFileType
member.summary: The desired file type to which the input document should be converted to

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WordProcessingSaveOptions.ConvertFileType
member.summary: The desired file type to which the input document should be converted to

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WordProcessingSaveOptions.Dpi
member.summary: Desired page DPI after conversion. The default resolution is: 96dpi

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WordProcessingSaveOptions.Password
member.summary: Set this property if you want to protect the converted document with a password

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Conversion.Options.Save.WordProcessingSaveOptions.Zoom
member.summary: Specifies the zoom level in percentage. Default is 100. Default zoom is supported till Microsoft Word 2010. Starting from Microsoft Word 2013 default zoom is no longer set to document, instead it appears to use the zoom factor of the last document that was opened.
